data.name: Offside
data.detailed_description:
When Kensington FC’s top striker goes missing a week before the Champion’s League finals, it’s up to a unique and very eccentric private detective to find out where the athlete is and bring him back in time for the game.

“Offside!” is a romantic-comedy sports-thriller Visual Novel where you step into the shoes of Alex Strider, an ex-footballer turned private investigator who uses his unique experience combined with a very peculiar (and oftentimes hilarious) way of finding out the truth.

Will you find the missing footballer before it’s too late?

Will you be able to help the team win the coveted cup?

Will you step in and show the team how it’s done?

Will you find love along the way?

Only you can find out!


  • A gripping, heartfelt and, often times, comical storyline.
  • Beautiful anime style character art
  • Hand painted backgrounds
  • An addictive football minigame
  • Smooth jazz background music
